name: 1st Pixel Car Race - Dangerous Pixels
description:
Love racing? Then you will love this little game.

We love 8bit graphics, and we love cars. So we created this racing game. The first of this kind. If you enjoy this, place a positive rating and we will update it according to your suggestions.

The things you should avoid are: other cars, tires, and concrete roadblocks. Other than that, have a good time, and try to beat your friends score.

In the end, this is just a relaxing game.

Enjoy, and leave your rating if you feel like it.

Thanks for playing!
